meanings.definition: A type of lighting fixture that uses gas as a fuel source.
meanings.sent1: The gasoliers in the old mansion flickered softly in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of antique gasoliers from the Victorian era.
meanings.sent3: As the gasoliers hummed, it seemed like they were whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The gasoliers cast a warm glow, turning the room into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the gasoliers made them the focal point of the room.
